31 class ForceGenerator
32 {
33 public:
34
39 virtual void updateForce(RigidBody *body, real duration) = 0;
40 };
41

50
51 public:
52

55

58 };

234 {

422 class ForceRegistry
423 {
424 protected:
425
430 struct ForceRegistration
431 {
432 RigidBody *body;
433 ForceGenerator *fg;
434 };
435
439 typedef std::vector<ForceRegistration> Registry;
440 Registry registrations;
441
442 public:
447 void add(RigidBody* body, ForceGenerator *fg);
448
454 void remove(RigidBody* body, ForceGenerator *fg);
455
461 void clear();

468 };
